official_title: A bill to clarify procedures for the disposal of Federal lands for use for public airport purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to repeal the requirement that the Attorney General approve the transfer of Government-owned lands for public airport purposes. Makes the provisions of the Surplus Property Act of 1944 (relating to the disposition of property for public airports) inapplicable to this Act. Sets forth procedures for the conveyance of lands for airports where such conveyance was requested of the Secretary of Transportation by a Federal department or agency before the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to clarify procedures for the disposal of Federal lands for use for public airport purposes.
